1:
Grandma was an Indian and we’re keeping the culture alive!
Salute the real American Indians!
Everybody ain’t One!
#indiansonly
2:
It’s time for us to “organize the truth!” 
We have come together under a common unity, our ancestral ties to America! 
Many of us have ancestors who fought and died for our freedom, and we all have ancestors who have sacrificed so much to maintain a glimmer of their cultural heritage and identity! 
Let not their names be forgotten! 
Let not their achievements be hidden! 
Let not their descendants be ashamed! 

But on the contrary, let the blood in your veins be full of rays of light, full of the pride that comes with knowing that you are the accomplishment of your ancestors sacrifices. 
Your life is their legacy!
Honor their efforts! 

We Will Help You Tell their stories!

1. We will be organizing our family names and stories into an encyclopedia. 
This book will be published in alphabetical order with stories that we provide about our own family history with notable information about our family members. 

2.  We will be publishing a family photo archive book where we showcase the pictures and photographs of our family along with their names and captions of the photo. 

These publications will be of our community members and made available to our community members for free so that they may start using these books, about us, as teaching tools and as satisfying sources of entertainment. 

Your family deserves to be in these books alongside other true and proud Americans. Their efforts deserves to be memorialized! 

All of us together, hand by hand, holding strong to grandma’s legacy! 

In honor of their memory! 

Become a member of this page, subscribe now! 

This page has become our community hub! 
Members- are our family! 
The members of this page will serve as the Great Council! 

Only Members vote on our events & our issues. 
Only Members can attend all events! 
Only Members can share their agendas & ideals! 
Only Members can be moderators on this page. 

All Members will now be safe behind a firewall, away from trolls and those who have not yet decided to commit themselves to their American legacy! 

Be the light. 
Join us and never be forgotten!

Members are welcome to share and to communicate! 
Members are welcome to add on!
Members are welcome to help us build! 
Members will be remembered! 

This community won’t let them be forgotten! 
Subscribe now!
